con:configuration.scriptText:
def jsonRes = messageExchange.getResponse().contentAsString
def jsonSlurper = new groovy.json.JsonSlurper(); def parse = jsonSlurper.parseText(jsonRes)
def diningOptions = parse.diningOptions log.info diningOptions assert diningOptions!=null
def tradDining = parse.diningOptions.traditionalDining.dining.seatingCd log.info tradDining assert tradDining!=null
def openDining = parse.diningOptions.openDining.dining.seatingCd log.info openDining assert openDining!=null

def jsonRes = messageExchange.getResponse().contentAsString
def jsonSlurper = new groovy.json.JsonSlurper(); def parse = jsonSlurper.parseText(jsonRes)
def bedding = parse.beddings log.info bedding assert bedding!=null
def bed = parse.beddings.bedding log.info bed assert bed!=null
def bedCode = parse.beddings.bedding.description log.info bedCode assert bedCode!=null

def openDining = parse.diningOptions.openDining.dining.seatingCd log.info openDining assert openDining!=null
